context.description: The Visualiser view displays a bars-and-stripes style view of the information it is given. The information given depends on which Visualiser provider is active.

topic.label: Writing a plug-in for the Visualiser

context.description: The Visualiser Menu view displays a list of the stripe kinds shown in the Visualiser view and enables you to manage them.

topic.label: Writing a plug-in for the Visualiser
